title: 25e08. Nonexempt work enforcement policy.
text:
The exemption for an employee employed in exempt work is defeated in
any week in which he performs a substantial amount (more than 20%) of nonexempt
work. (See IB 788.17.)
html: The exemption for an employee employed in exempt work is defeated in any week in which he performs a substantial amount (more than 20%) of nonexempt work. (See IB 788.17.)
